name: Still Model 3
description:
· A simulation bondage art, and beautiful models appointment, together with the photography game.
· Game content: realistic style 3D scenes, beautiful models, a variety of clothes, hundreds of photography poses.
· Story mode: models in different scenes, wearing different clothes, posing in different poses, players seize the opportunity to adjust the camera and press the shutter.
· Free mode: the player can freely choose the scene, clothing, makeup, posture and facial expression for photography.
· In short, players can experience a very good process of dating and photography in the game.
